metadata.Title: CVE-2020-22628 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: Buffer Overflow vulnerability in LibRaw::stretch() function in libraw\src\postprocessing\aspect_ratio.cpp.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> In focal, code is in dcraw/dcraw.c and internal/dcraw_common.cpp.

criterions.comment: darktable: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
